org.baswell.httproxy

Class SimpleIODirector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.baswell.httproxy.SimpleProxyDirector
      • org.baswell.httproxy.SimpleIODirector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOProxyDirector, ProxyDirector

    public class SimpleIODirector
extends SimpleProxyDirector
implements IOProxyDirector
    A simple IOProxyDirector that proxies to a single server and prints out proxy events.
